data.name: EbonSide
data.detailed_description:
The brand new indie game hitting the screen, The curse of the ebony sword: Ebonside!


A Indie JRPG with a lot of features from crafting to dreaded boss fights!

As time pasts, the land that once housed life now houses a giant evil. And only you can stop it

Battle the darkness with classic classes from the old days of JRPGs with some new ones as well!
With a warrior, Black mage, Thief or a Dark Artisan, you can unlock and change into any class that
fits your playstyle!

Craft from hundreds of crafting trees! From carpentry, smiting, cooking and more!

Breed and race your own kakata!

AND FIGHT BIG FRICKING MONSTERS!

Key points!
* Hundreds of Crafting recipes to learn and craft!
* Nine Classes to play and master!
* Rare monsters to find and hunt!
* Big Chungus
* A loveable cast of Characters!
*A Real time Day and Night system

data.short_description: Its been 300 years after the god of light died and the world is in a state of chaos. And now the legendary sword Ebonside is in the hands of evil! Take up arms and rise up to challenge the darkness and bring light to the world once more!
data.reviews:
“I am personally going to keep an eye out for this one and I see this game climbing the ranks in the JRPG genre as long as production continues and the developer can keep perfectly executing these huge, unique mechanics.”
Beta Tested, Game Reviewed

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: i5 Core
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 950
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

content_descriptors.notes: Use of alcoholic drinks but no alcohol abuse
